posts.content:
so it looks like I have got to remake the interior of my van and would like to make a change to the design if possible.

I'm looking for a full width bed that is made up in the load area not over the rear engine hump if possible as id like to make this the cooking and clothes storage area.

I'm looking to make the whole thing myself and I have access to a full woodshop with boat building machinery so I'm sorted for tools etc.

its for a panelvan and Id like it to be dark and moody as its a van I can build up the sides of the rear hatch to allow storage of clothes etc.

soo any pics or inspiration at all? id be gratefull cheers
